meanings.sent1: The inconsequent decision to wear mismatched socks made her smile.
meanings.sent2: The inconsequent doodles in the margin of the notebook distracted the student.
meanings.sent3: His inconsequent jokes always lightened the mood during meetings.
meanings.sent4: The inconsequent details in the painting added a sense of whimsy.
meanings.sent5: The inconsequent chatter in the background made it hard to focus.

meanings.definition: Not following as a logical consequence
meanings.sent1: The inconsequent actions of the character confused the audience.
meanings.sent2: The inconsequent plot twist left the viewers scratching their heads.
meanings.sent3: The inconsequent sequence of events in the story kept everyone guessing.
meanings.sent4: Her inconsequent behavior in class disrupted the lesson flow.
meanings.sent5: The inconsequent changes in the weather made planning difficult.
